title: CloudFront Extensions
subTitle: 在不同的场景中方便地使用 Amazon CloudFront
desc: CloudFront Extensions 包括丰富的特色 Lambda@Edge、CloudFront 函数、适用于各种用户场景的 CDK 模板和开箱即用的监控解决方案。

benifits.title: 优点和特点
benifits.beft1Desc: You can find the code implementation of most common Amazon CloudFront use cases. All solutions and applications included are vetted by Amazon Web Services.
benifits.beft2Desc: You can easily deploy CloudFront applications or solutions into your Amazon Web Services console with just 1-click.
benifits.beft3Desc: Amazon CloudFront Extensions is an open-source project. You can use the solutions and applications for free. If you have different use cases, you can take the source code as reference to make your own implementation.
benifits.beft4Desc: Amazon CloudFront Extensions includes a rich ret of extensions which cover various use cases.

usecase.title: 使用场景
usecase.usecase1Desc: This solution provides a template for using WAF and Shield Advanced on CloudFront, it will automatically deploy a set of WAF rules and Shield protection groups into your AWS account to secure your web application against DDoS attack, badbot, SQL injection attack, XSS attack and block the IP which has bad reputation.
usecase.usecase2Desc: Resize pictures on the fly according to dimensions passed by the query parameter.

getStarted.title: 开始使用
getStarted.desc: Find common extensions for your CloudFront
